title: Veterinarian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player. If they are attacked, you research their corpse and unlock Wide Protect. You also will Anesthetize the attacker, which takes effect tomorrow at the start of the day.
- Wide Protect: This ability starts locked. Visit 3 players at night, protecting them all and curing poison.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only heal yourself once.
- Anesthetized players are unable to perform ANY abilities today or tonight. This goes through roleblock and other disruption immunities.
- If you are attacked and protected, Wide Protect cannot be used the next night as you get new surgical equipment.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - After a good player is hanged, you may heal a player and both their neighbors (skipping you as a neighbor). 1 use.
